fields_of_interest: Trade, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
belgium_office_address: Avenue de Tervueren 188a, Postbox 4, 1150 Brussels, Belgium
goals__remit: International Flight Services Association (IFSA) is a global professional association representing the interests of airline and railway personnel, inflight and rail caterers and suppliers responsible for providing onboard passenger services on regularly scheduled travel routes. It is a non-profit trade association that monitors American and EU legislative issues of relevance to its members, participates in public consultations, identifies potential conflicts and delivers common positions. IFSA is dedicated to promoting food safety in the onboard services industry.
